1.title: Time Capsule
1.lyrics:
Hey, hey, step right in, the door's unlocked,
Got a rocket beat and a clock that's rocked,
Flashy lights, neon nights, synths ignite,
We're blasting off, gonna ride this vibe tonight.

Spin the dial, catch the wave, rewind the sound,
From vinyl spins to beats that pound,
Groove through the decades, electric sky,
Join the ride, don't be shy, come on, fly high.

Time capsule's warm, the past is alive,
Echoes of tomorrow, let's twist and dive,
Feel that pulse, hearts align, we're synchronized,
Every note's a story, come and realize.

Jump in the time capsule, hold on tight,
Dancing through decades, a wild delight,
From disco balls to synth-pop's glow,
We're the rhythm makers, ready to blow.

Bass kicks in, then the drums attack,
Flashback fever on this stellar track,
Mirror balls spin like a cosmic dance,
Take this chance, it's your moment, advance.

Time capsule's glow, electric and bright,
We own the past, we own the night,
With every beat, we break the mold,
A musical journey worth more than gold.

Jump in the time capsule, hold on tight,
Dancing through decades, a wild delight,
From disco balls to synth-pop's glow,
We're the rhythm makers, ready to blow.

Yeah, step inside and never look back,
Riding this wave on the neon track,
Together we launch, the future's in sight,
In this time capsule, we own the night.

2.title: Roaring 20s Redux
2.lyrics:
In a city dressed in velvet nights,
Where the moonlight spills in golden lights,
Flappers spin tales in feathered pride,
Whispers of jazz the secret guide.

Champagne spills in crystal streams,
Dancing shadows chase their dreams,
In the heart of a speakeasy dive,
The roaring spirit comes alive.

Raise your glass to the shimmering stars,
Gatsby's garden behind iron bars,
Saxophones cry, the trumpets sway,
We live the magic of yesterday.

Snap your fingers, tap your feet,
The night's alive with a sultry beat,
Upright bass hums a midnight tune,
Piano keys beneath the silver moon.

Flashing smiles, the perfect guise,
Glasses clink in a sweet surprise,
Turn the dial back, let's rewind,
To jazz age parties, undefined.

Raise your glass to the shimmering stars,
Gatsby's garden behind iron bars,
Saxophones cry, the trumpets sway,
We live the magic of yesterday.

Oh, the city's heartbeat, wild and free,
A symphony of mystery,
Underneath the velvet skies,
The roaring 20s never die.

Raise your glass to the shimmering stars,
Gatsby's garden behind iron bars,
Saxophones cry, the trumpets sway,
We live the magic of yesterday.

Toast to dreams that never fade,
In this jazzy masquerade,
Here's to the night, our sweet rendezvous,
Roaring 20s, we're back with you.

3.title: Jumpin' Jive (Lucky 30s)
3.lyrics:
Kick off your shoes, let the evening take flight,
Tin roof tops hum under neon moonlight,
Dial up the magic, that radio serenade,
Got tales of a golden age, never to fade.

Step in the shimmer where the spotlights play,
Hollywood whispers callin' us away,
Folks crowd the floor, jazz hands hold tight,
In the thunder of horns, we forget the night.

Jumpin' jive, baby, glide those blues aside,
Swingin' streets hum with love and pride,
Raise your glass to hope, in rhythm we thrive,
The beat's our shelter, we come alive.

Hear that scratch, that spin, on vinyl it rides,
Crooners and brass in perfect collides,
Through the haze of a world gone wild,
Together we're strong, every man, every child.

Jumpin' jive, baby, glide those blues aside,
Swingin' streets hum with love and pride,
Raise your glass to hope, in rhythm we thrive,
The beat's our shelter, we come alive.

So dance with me now, let the hard times slide,
In this dance hall of dreams, we can't hide,
From city streets to the grand marquee,
It's jazz, it's soulâ€”it's a community.

Jumpin' jive, baby, glide those blues aside,
Swingin' streets hum with love and pride,
Raise your glass to hope, in rhythm we thrive,
The beat's our shelter, we come alive.

4.title: Victory Stomp (40s)
4.lyrics:
The band starts swinging, hear that trumpet call,
Boots on the pavement, breaking down the wall,
From London fog to the Paris streets,
Every heart's a drum, every smile's a beat.

Victory stomp, clap your hands, feel the night alive,
Spin your partner 'round, watch the hope arrive,
Raise your voices high, let the chorus play,
We dance the dark away, peace is on the way.

Steel will unbroken, though the skies were gray,
Letters from home, keep the fear at bay,
Sisters and brothers, side by side we stand,
Moving to the rhythm of a promised land.

Victory stomp, clap your hands, feel the night alive,
Spin your partner 'round, watch the hope arrive,
Raise your voices high, let the chorus play,
We dance the dark away, peace is on the way.

Hear the joyful echoes from the towns and farms,
Swinging in the moonlight, arms wrapped in arms,
The flag waves freely, waving through the strife,
Dancing into glory, stepping into life.

Victory stomp, clap your hands, feel the night alive,
Spin your partner 'round, watch the hope arrive,
Raise your voices high, let the chorus play,
We dance the dark away, peace is on the way.

Victory stomp, clap your hands, swing to brighter days,
Triumph in our hearts, in this joyful blaze,
Lift your spirits high, in sweet harmony,
Together we stand, forever free!

5.title: Sock Hop Serenade (50s)
5.lyrics:
Cruisin' down the boulevard in your cherry red machine
Shining chrome and leather seats, like a movie scene
Jukebox hummin' softly, doo-wop on the breeze
Every note's a spark that sets my heart at ease

Milkshake smiles, strawberry lips, taste the summer heat
Sneaking glances in the dark, where love and rhythm meet
Underneath the neon glow, our shadows dancing close
In this sock hop serenade, you're the one I want the most

Spin me 'round, spin me 'round, in this flicker of the night
Turn the dial, hear that sound, feel the music take its flight
Rock'n'roll revolution, hearts in sweet parade
Hold me tight, baby, in our sock hop serenade

Your hand in mine, like vinyl smooth and true
Every beat an echo of the love I found in you
Classic cars and midnight stars, our secret rendezvous
A timeless dance in a world that's made for two

Milkshake sweet and cherry red, dancing through the years
Jukebox plays our favorite song, wiping all the tears
In this drive-in dream, you're my melody
Forever caught in this sweet symphony

Spin me 'round, spin me 'round, in this flicker of the night
Turn the dial, hear that sound, feel the music take its flight
Rock'n'roll revolution, hearts in sweet parade
Hold me tight, baby, in our sock hop serenade

Hold me tight, baby, in this sock hop serenadeâ€¦

6.title: Flower Groove (60s)
6.lyrics:
Sunset paints the city gold,
San Francisco dreams unfold,
Barefoot steps on earthy ground,
Voices rise, a sacred sound.

Hands entwined beneath the sky,
Whispered hopes that never die,
Colors bloom in every soul,
Hearts ignite to make us whole.

Flower groove, in fields we sway,
Love's a song we sing today,
Peace in every breath we move,
Dancing in the flower groove.

Echoes of a distant call,
Woodstock nights that still recall,
Dreamers marching side by side,
Changing tides we can't divide.

Tambourines and gentle rhymes,
Carry through the hands of time,
Harmony a sweet embrace,
In this peaceful, tender space.

Flower groove, in fields we sway,
Love's a song we sing today,
Peace in every breath we move,
Dancing in the flower groove.

Let the morning light renew,
What the old world never knew,
In the garden where we stand,
Freedom blooms at our command.

Flower groove, in fields we sway,
Love's a song we sing today,
Peace in every breath we move,
Dancing in the flower groove.

7.title: Disco Inferno (70s Fever)
7.lyrics:
Step into the light where the mirror balls spin,
Shimmer in your platform shoes, let the fever begin,
Bassline thumping like your heart on fire,
Strings slicing smooth, taking you higher.

Glitter in the air, neon in your eyes,
Dancefloor's calling out, no room for disguise,
Shake it like Lizzo, groove like Nile's guitar,
Tonight we own this disco star.

Disco inferno, burning up the night,
Funk in every move, feel the magic ignite,
Spin me 'round the room, keep that rhythm alive,
70s fever's here, let's come alive!

Break out the wah wah, funk guitar's the key,
Every step a revolution, every move is free,
Platform shoes stomping to the bass's command,
We're the kings and queens of this disco land.

Raise your hands up high, let the music explore,
Neon light reflections spinning on the floor,
Heartbeat syncopated to the rhythm's embrace,
We don't stop groovin', we own this space.

Disco inferno, burning up the night,
Funk in every move, feel the magic ignite,
Spin me 'round the room, keep that rhythm alive,
70s fever's here, let's come alive!

Mirror balls cascade, lighting up the scene,
Dancing in a fever dream, so fresh, so clean,
Lizzo's fire, Nile's funky soul,
Together we ignite, making disco whole.

Disco inferno, blazing 'til the dawn,
Funky fever's raging â€” come and get it on,
Platform shoes and endless groove,
We bring the heat, don't lose the move!

Disco inferno, burning up the night,
Funk in every move, feel the magic ignite,
Spin me 'round the room, keep that rhythm alive,
70s fever's hereâ€”let's come alive!

8.title: Neon Nights (Electric 80s)
8.lyrics:
Flashin' lights and pixel fights, we're lost inside the arcade glow
Molten nights, the city bites, thrift store shades and vinyl low
Got Nirvana on the soundtrack, flannel ghosts in neon haze
Slacker kings in combat boots, we're jukebox rebels out to blaze

Joystick dreams and candy beams, rewindin' life in 8-bit waves
Cigarette sparks in mini skirts, pop culture rebels misbehave
Synth pulse racing through the vein, electric hearts collide and race
Pixelated memories turn to gold inside this crowded space

Neon nights, we come alive, electric pulses never die
Dancing under chrome-lit skies, we're fireflies in synth-pop highs
Neon nights, let's ride the storm, arcade kings forever born
In this hyper-color storm, lost in the static, party's on

Cassette tapes and midnight escapes, caffeine shooting through our veins
Slouching slow in thrift store clothes, with a soundtrack mixed in sugar cane
Crash the scene with laser beams, slacker heroes in the glow
Retro dreams and midnight schemes, plug me in, let's overload

Pixel hearts in overdrive, broken records rewind the time
Game over never felt so right, crashed the systemâ€”take the night

Neon nights, we come alive, electric pulses never die
Dancing under chrome-lit skies, we're fireflies in synth-pop highs
Neon nights, let's ride the storm, arcade kings forever born
In this hyper-color storm, lost in the static, party's on

Flash the screen, a silvery gleam, hold me close, let's chase the dream
Synth-loaded, pop exploded, coming through the city seams

Neon nights, we come alive, electric pulses never die
Dancing under chrome-lit skies, we're fireflies in synth-pop highs
Neon nights, let's ride the storm, arcade kings forever born
In this hyper-color storm, lost in the static, party's on

9.title: Grunge & Flannel (90s Nostalgia)
9.lyrics:
Ripped jeans hang like flags from my window
Faded flannel stitched with the years I don't know
Tap the screen, rewind a burnt-out soul
Nirvana whispering through the stereo glow

Cheap thrift store kings in tired leather boots
Slacker anthems carved in our mute disputes
MTV static, black-and-white confessions
Angst turned to art, a neon obsession

I'm a ghost in the feedback, a shadow in the roar
Screaming in silence like the '90s before
We wear our wounds louder than a downbeat snare
Lost kids screaming in the smoke-filled air

Grunge & flannel, bleed it raw and true
Anger's the ink, rebellion's residue
Static rebellion on a cracked TV screen
We're the faded dream of a forgotten scene

Locked in a loop of rebellion and rust
Sneering at the future, distrust and disgust
We built our empires on echoes and scars
MTV monsters, chasing fallen stars

Turn it up, let the chaos collide
Radio burns with the rage we can't hide
Grunge & flannel, the anthem that stays
Rebels rewriting the sad decade's haze

Grunge & flannel, bleed it raw and true
Anger's the ink, rebellion's residue
Static rebellion on a cracked TV screen
We're the faded dream of a forgotten scene

10.title: Dot Com Dreams (Y2K Millennium)
10.lyrics:
Flashin' screens, neon beams, dial up dreams ignite
Pixel hearts on AIM, typing through the night
Cyber pulse, electric rush, heartbeat syncs in code
Future's flashing in my eyes, download overload

Midnight calls on dot com lines, yeah, we own the scene
Y2K countdown, life's a wild machine
Vocoder voices in the air, singing digital love
No fear in the millennium, stars are shining above

Hold tight, the future is now, we're breaking out the seams
Bit by bit, byte by byte, chasing dot com dreams
We're the kids of the new dawn, surfing cyber streams
Light speed love on a neon wave, living dot com dreams

Hack the night with boy-band charm, charisma on fire
Glitch and glam, electric jam, taking us higher
Binary beats, dancing free, pixelated soul
We're wired up, unstoppable, on a Y2K roll

Hold tight, the future is now, we're breaking out the seams
Bit by bit, byte by byte, chasing dot com dreams
We're the kids of the new dawn, surfing cyber streams
Light speed love on a neon wave, living dot com dreams

Flash the code, spark the show, revolution's here
Optimism overload, no time for fear
From dial-up days to fiber phase, rising like a star
Y2K is just the start, we're taking it far

Hold tight, the future is now, we're breaking out the seams
Bit by bit, byte by byte, chasing dot com dreams
We're the kids of the new dawn, surfing cyber streams
Light speed love on a neon wave, living dot com dreams

11.title: Viral Vibes (2010s)
11.lyrics:
Scrollin' up, scrollin' down, post it once, then it's gone,
Snap a pic, make a vid, now the whole world's on,
Got that spray paint drip, move that lip sync quick,
Watch me hit 10K likes, yeah I'm 'bout to get lit.

TikTok dances in my shoes, flossin' on that viral news,
Swipe left, swipe right, catch the beat on every night,
Emoji rain, heart-eyes fly, diamond chains in the pixel sky,
Watch me blow up on your feed, viral vibes, yeah, that's my creed.

ðŸŽ‰ Hit the jump, do the wave, all my haters lookin' brave,
Snap that clap, do a spin, caught up in the meme again,
Clout chasin', no time for hatin', all these trends keep on creatin',
Livestream poppin', chat explodin', viral vibes are always loaded.

Scrollin' fast, but I'm on beat, every post just can't be beat,
Likes blow up, baring gold, every share's worth more than sold,
From the dawn to midnight, feeds light up so tight,
Got the world in my palm, this vibe is pure bomb.

ðŸŽ‰ Hit the jump, do the wave, all my haters lookin' brave,
Snap that clap, do a spin, caught up in the meme again,
Clout chasin', no time for hatin', all these trends keep on creatin',
Livestream poppin', chat explodin', viral vibes are always loaded.

Double tap, gotta flex, viral life's the new complex,
Emoji faces, heart eruptions, in this digital eruption,
Flashin' lights, grindin' flex, on the rise in cyberspace,
No cap, this vibe's real, ride this wave, it's all surreal.

ðŸŽ‰ Hit the jump, do the wave, all my haters lookin' brave,
Snap that clap, do a spin, caught up in the meme again,
Clout chasin', no time for hatin', all these trends keep on creatin',
Livestream poppin', chat explodin', viral vibes are always loaded.

12.title: Homebody Anthem (2020s New Normal)
12.lyrics:
Flicker of the screen in the dark, another Zoom call starts
Laughter packed in pixels, but I miss the beating hearts
Wearing masks like second skins, our smiles remain unseen
Tracing shapes on foggy glass where your breath used to lean

Banana bread in the oven, timer counting down the days
Silver linings in the chaos, little sparks in muted greys
Counting miles in sleepless nights, your voice a half-heard tune
Together apart, we're dancing under this quarantine moon

And I'll be your homebody anthem, soft and low and slow
Waiting for the world outside to catch us as we grow
In this pause of everything normal, we find our own form
In the quiet, in the distance, love keeps us warm

Scrolling through our lists of dreams, dusty but still alive
Shared playlists and our whispered hopes help us survive
Laundry piles and empty streets, echoes fill the space
But when your laughter breaks through, time can't keep pace

And I'll be your homebody anthem, soft and low and slow
Waiting for the world outside to catch us as we grow
In this pause of everything normal, we find our own form
In the quiet, in the distance, love keeps us warm

So here's to silver linings, and this strange new rhyme
Of being close but distant, lost inside the time
Though the nights feel longer, and the days rearranged
I find you in the moments that haven't changed

And I'll be your homebody anthem, soft and low and slow
Waiting for the world outside to catch us as we grow
In this pause of everything normal, we find our own form
In the quiet, in the distance, love keeps us warm

13.title: Back to the Future (Outro)
13.lyrics:
Step inside the capsule of time, hearts beating in rhyme
From roaring twenties' smoky rooms to jumps in jive sublime
Victory stomps beneath the stars, sock hop serenades we find
Flowers bloom, disco thunders, neon nights unwind

Echoes of grunge in flannel worn, dot com dreams on fire born
Viral vibes that pulse and play, homebody warmth at break of dawn
We trace the steps, the notes, the sounds, a tapestry reworn
Spinning wheels of past and now, to futures yet untorn

Hold the moments, catch the glow, from silent films to streaming shows
Each beat a memory, each word a world we sew
In cycles spun by unseen hands, where yesterday meets the plans
The road ahead loops back again, where every ending starts to grow

Back to the future, time's gentle dance, we're standing still in each new chance
Eyes wide open, hearts entwined, to write the stories left behind
So make the memories you want to keep, from whispered dreams to mountains steep
The past's a mirror, the future's lightâ€”both held in this endless night

Sing the song of neon streams, jazzy nights and pixel dreams
From vinyl crackle to synth wave beams, the soundscape flows and gleams
We carry the rhythm, the silent hum, in every breath, the beat of drums
Time bends, it breaks, it softly mendsâ€”where all beginnings come from ends

Back to the future, here we stand, reaching out to hand in hand
The story's yours to sketch and weave, in every dawn we still believe
In all the moments we create, the love, the loss, the twist of fate
The journey spins, but one truth stays: the song unfolds, the music plays.
